description:
Space detective 556 has arrived on Earth, and he`s here to defeat his arch-nemesis, Keroro!  Well, maybe they`re not quite as much enemies as they seem...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Seigi to Binbou no Uchuu Tantei de Arimasu / Kogorou Tokusatsu Shuushoku Saizensen! de Arimasu
Keroro et le détective de l`espace / Un emploi pour Zedor
ケロロ 正義と貧乏の宇宙探偵 であります / 556 特撮就職最前線! であります
